Jobs.title: VP Sales
Jobs.description: ', 'Awarded the Rising Star award for 2010.', 'Served as the Cash Management expert for the North American Sales team helping bringing to closure several Cash Management opportunities.', 'Presented sessions at several regional trade shows, including WACHA, EPCOR, EastPay, and Southern Financial Exchange.', "Presented and championed sessions at Fundtech's Annual Client Conferences.", '

Jobs.title: Sr. Business Analyst
Jobs.description: ', 'Responsible for ACH, Check Processing, Mobile Banking projects. ', 'Created functional specifications using UML, ERD Diagrams, DD documents, and other standard tools.', 'Provided consulting services to Clear2Pay Americas customers and helped them define their Mobile Banking strategy.', '

Jobs.title: VP Delivery - QA Manager
Jobs.description: ', "Ensured successful delivery of Fundtech's latest generation Cash Management product, CASHplus®, to over sixty-eight financial institutions, by directing the development, QA, and Professional Services teams in a matrix environment. ", "Co-designed CASHplus's Integrated ACH module, which includes EPN820, BOC, and IAT functionality.", "Managed Fundtech's Cash Management QA teams.", 'Defined the direction of CASHplus®, which is currently in production in 30 banks and scheduled to be deployed in thirteen others.', "Managed Fundtech's Cash Management BA team", '

Jobs.title: Japanese Language Instructor
Jobs.description: ', 'Taught JAPN 1000-level, JAPN 3000-level, and JAPN 4xxx (Directed Reading) courses, having full responsibility for Syllabus and Class Schedule creation, test and quiz creation and correction. Class sizes varied from 12 to 30 students.', '

Jobs.title: Sr. Business Analyst
Jobs.description: ', 'Cash Management Business Unit', 'Created functional specifications using UML, ERD Diagrams, DD documents, and other standard tools.', 'Led the Transactional Team responsible for the definition of all transactional modules of the application, including Money Transfer, Internal Account Transfer, Positive Pay, and Commercial Loans modules.', '

Jobs.title: Information Specialist
Jobs.description: ', 'Information Specialist', '•Managed the Cash Management helpdesk for Europe and North America', '•Responsible for supporting four Japanese banks’ branches in Germany, England, Spain, Mexico, Brazil, and the US, as well as the branches’ end-customers.', '•Served as liaison between EDS development, QA, and helpdesk teams in Japan and Alpharetta and ensured smooth communication between the different team members.', '•Developed applications in diverse industry sectors following EDS’s standard development guidelines.', '', 'Project and Development Manager', '•Produced functional and technical specifications for the Cash Management products implemented in four of the 11 Japanese major banks.', '•Developed Visual C++ applications for the Cash Management division. ', '•Managed geographically dispersed (China, Japan, and the United States) development teams to ensure the development of enhancements to EDS’s Cash Management offerings according to schedule and within budget.', '•Interfaced with internal and external customers at all levels.', '•Managed project from start to completion guaranteeing on-time and on-budget delivery of systems.', '

Jobs.title: Assistant Manager
Jobs.description: ', '•Managed geographically dispersed (China, Japan, and Thailand) development teams.', '•Produced functional specs for Thailand’s RTGS, BAHTNet ', '•Facilitated and participated in meetings between the Central Bank of Thailand and NTT International. ', '•Supported the Sales Process for projects in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, and Colombo, Sri Lanka.', '

Jobs.title: Assistant Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'Developed internal applications for PO, Invoicing, Warehouse, EDI, Email, Inventory Control, AR/AP systems. ', 'Served as liaison between departments in Tokyo and departments in the US, Germany, and Singapore.', '
